column4: I am unable to connect Ubuntu from RHEL5.1 (i am using ssh but its showing this error message "ssh: connect to host 192.168.1.6 port 22: Connection timed out")
double check ip addy and make sure there's no firewall blocking you
and you're sure ssh is running on both?
02:31 < MTecknology> awanti: and you're sure ssh is running on both?
